# AnimationEvents.PlaybackLooped

**Structure**

The event raised when an animation loops.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PlaybackLooped
```

## Overview

You loop animation playback by creating an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationResource] instance from an existing one with either the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationResource/repeat(count:)] or the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationResource/repeat(duration:)] method.

## Getting the controller

- **playbackController**: The animation playback controller managing the animation that triggered the event.

## Recognizing animation events

- **AnimationEvents.PlaybackStarted**: The event raised when an animation has been started.
- **AnimationEvents.PlaybackCompleted**: The event raised when an animation reaches the end of its duration.
- **AnimationEvents.PlaybackTerminated**: The event raised when an animation has been terminated, regardless of whether it ran to completion.

## Conforms To

- Event
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
